name: Wipe Factor
description:
WipeFactor is an exciting and challenging game that tests players' physical coordination, speed, and movement skills. In this game, players must work together as a team to overcome various physical obstacles and reach the finish line.



Character Customization:
You can quickly throw yourself into the world of wipe factor by freely customizing your character's gender, accessories, hair style and face details.



Emote Wheel:
Enjoy the wins and share your skills with Emotes!

One of the key features of WipeFactor is team-based gameplay, which encourages players to work together and support each other in order to succeed. The game is designed to be fast-paced and action-packed, with a variety of different obstacles and challenges to overcome. Whether you are an experienced gamer or new to the world of competitive gaming, WipeFactor is sure to provide an exciting and enjoyable experience.
